entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:49 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 9:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -11.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -14.0°C
Wind: SW 29 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
